channel.title: Auto Cache Downloader Problem [DeathlyPvpz V4.1] [Solved Because I'm An Idiot]
channel.description:
Hi, there and thank you for taking the time to try to help me. So, since RSWebclients shut down, I need to make my own custom webclient... I am using the source, client, and cache from the latest release of DeathlyPvpz V4.1 (https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,633225.0.html). I need to first make an auto cache downloader, right? It didn't come with it, so I've been looking at some guides to do it myself. They say to search for "new Update" or "drawLoadingText(0, "Connecting to File Server...");" But I couldn't find either of those. And yes, I am searching in the client sided client.java. DeathlyPvpz uses InsanityX as a base if that helps. I've included some pictures and my client.java in Pastebin and in an Mega download.
By the way, in the last picture, I think I found where the "new Update" would be, but I don't know how I would put my cache link there, instead of what is already there without getting a compiling error. Thank you so much for trying to help me and absolutely any help is appreciated.
Client.java on Pastebin - http://pastebin.com/anQksfPs
Client.java Uploaded to Mega - https://mega.co.nz/#!psYh0Joa!aY9-wUuKXZ24loYupf-NpF3yq8kvKvwGxHv0lbSkBvE
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/286w9ys.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/raxm5v.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4s0dw0.jpg[/img]
In the last picture, I think I found where the new Update would be, but I don't know how I would put my cache link there, instead of what is already there without getting a compiling error. Thank you so much for trying to help me and absolutely any help is appreciated.

item.title: Auto Cache Downloader Problem [DeathlyPvpz V4.1] [Solved Because I'm An Idiot]
item.dc:creator: @iRobertTM iRobertTM
item.description:
@iRobertTM wrote:

Arcik:

You must have a CacheDownloader.java? You can change the link there.

I can’t even express how stupid I feel right now…

Read full topic
item.source: Auto Cache Downloader Problem [DeathlyPvpz V4.1] [Solved Because I'm An Idiot]
